entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of snow or rain late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
